FuncDef: This command configures the state timer for PCE-initiated LSPs. The state timer must be set to a value greater than the redelegation timer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of seconds before the state timer expires. Values-1 to 3600.
Specifies the actions that are taken on undelegated LSPs upon the state timer expiration. Values-remove, none. ParamDefault: Default- remove
